rent_primary_title: Real time â€“ only at Flexcavo
100_security_paragraph: Top maintained machines and transparent costs
book_now_paragraph: View real-time machine availability at any time and from anywhere
booking_meeting: Book an initial meeting for a first consultation.
career_primary_subtitle: We are on a mission to enable intelligent construction! We are looking for pioneers, visionaries and doers. And we need you!nabl
career_secondary_subtitle:
Some of our team members grew up in construction and are at their happiest on the jobsite. Others excel in the office or remotely - whether deep in code or building new products. We're a diverse team connected by our passion for solving problems together.

What is your passion?
cockpit_section_description: FlexcavoOS is the cloud-based solution for the efficient control of your entire construction machinery fleet. Based on the latest technology, we bring your fleet into the digital age. This allows you to manage all construction machines, from large performance machines to small equipment, across all manufacturers and maintain an overview of your fleet and processes at all times through real-time data.
cockpit_section_title: FlexcavoOS - The digital solution for the intelligent construction site
contact_description: Flexcavo GmbH needs the contact information you provide to contact you regarding our products and services. You may opt out of these notifications at any time.
contact_main_subtitle: We would love to show you how you can benefit from Flexcavo. Choose how you would like to get in touch with us. We look forward to exchanging ideas with you!
easy_paragraph: With Flexcavo, you have your fleet and your construction projects in one tool. Manufacturer-independent, you receive information in real time and can efficiently control your construction machinery, small equipment and much more to save both costs and time!
functionality_fleet_features: Monitor the status of all your your projects at a glance.  Manage your entire fleet  and start with us in the the digital age in cloud-based fleet management.
functionality_primary_title:
Optimize the use of
 construction machinery with Flexcavo
functionality_projects_features: We simplify your planning. Say goodbye to paperwork and manage projects, construction machines and much more in one intuitive tool.
functionality_rent_features: You have big plans and need additional construction machinery? We got you! View the availability of our rental fleet online and reserve your rental machinery on the spot.
functionality_secondary_subtitle: We develop digital solutions along the entire construction machinery life cycle.
functionality_secondary_title: Efficient, simple and digital planning of construction machinery
future_oriented_paragraph: We innovate the construction industry and consider technology to be at the core of our business. Our FlexcavoOS helps you to enable intelligent construction sites both optimizing and automating your processes.
future_technology_description: Behind our Flexcavo OS is state-of-the-art technology. From the collection of telematics data to its processing in our intuitive user interface. We treat your machine usage data with the utmost confidentiality making Flexcavo the most reliable partner for the contractor of tomorrow.
future_technology_title: The technology of the future for intelligent fleet management
hiring_subtitle: We are always looking for new talents for Flexcavo. Take a look at our positions - we are looking forward to your application!
home_main_subtitle_1: We combine our rental fleet with innovative technology to
home_main_subtitle_2: optimize the use of construction equipment for you.
how_to_help_you_subtitle: You have questions about Flexcavo? We offer you a free consultation to find the best possible solution for you.
one_stop_shop_paragraph: Construction machinery and software solutions for your construction site in one tool
partnership_paragraph: Together we develop customer-oriented solutions to jointly shape the digital future of construction.Flexcavo is your long-term partner for the digitalization of construction machinery, materials and employees.
rent_benefit_subtitle_1: No large up-front capital investment - use construction machines only when needed.
rent_benefit_subtitle_2: No additional costs due to savings in maintenance and repair costs.
rent_benefit_subtitle_3: Use state of the art construction machinery ready to use at all times.
rent_benefit_subtitle_4: Each of our construction machines is equipped with the latest technology.
rent_benefit_subtitle_5: The right attachments for all construction machines.
rent_benefit_subtitle_6: You have the opportunity to test your new construction machinery before making a purchase decision.
rent_benefit_subtitle_7: Reduce your inefficiencies in manual accounting for construction equipment fleets.
rent_benefit_subtitle_8: We promise a significant reduction of the CO2 footprint.
rent_booking_title: Book your construction machine in under 5 minutes
rent_easily_paragraph_1: View the live availability of our rental fleet and rent directly online.
rent_easily_paragraph_2: We are more than a traditional rental company: We see technology at the core of our business and are your long-term partner for the digitization of your construction sites and construction machinery.
rent_easily_paragraph_3: See the status of your entire fleet in one tool. Manage your construction machinery fleet no matter where you are and start the digital age of fleet management with us.
rent_easily_title: A better way to rent construction machinery
rent_lean_back_paragraph: You receive all the information and documents you need digitally and can view your rental in FlexcavoOS, track its status live and manage everything with just a few clicks.
rent_order_paragraph: On the product page you can check the specifications of your machine again. With just one click you can add accessories, our services or a rental insurance. Now decide between delivery and pickup and you're done.
rent_primary_subtitle: Rent construction machinery around the clock.
rent_search_paragraph: Enter the construction machine type, name the location, filter by time period ... and go. Our overview only shows you which machines are available for rent. We call this real-time availability, so that you can find and rent the right machines in seconds.
rent_secondary_title: The easiest way to rent construction machinery
rent_third_title:
Reasons to rent construction machinery - 
 Your advantages at a glance
stay_informed_subtitle: With the Flexcavo newsletter you stay informed! We will send you news and events from Flexcavo, as well as vouchers and discounts for your next construction equipment rental! You will also benefit from tips and tricks on the use of construction machinery and software.
teams_description_1: As a strategic business development team, we always think three steps ahead - together with our customers. Which innovations will be relevant for our customers in the coming years? Which new partnerships should we enter into? Which new business areas should we open up? We are shaping the Flexcavo of tomorrow.
teams_description_2: As the Fleet operations team, we are responsible for the smooth and efficient running of our construction equipment business. From purchasing to maintenance to logistics - we make sure that a top-maintained machine arrives at the right place at the right time for our customer.
teams_description_3: Our Growth Team customers to enable intelligent construction sites with software. We want to build sustainable and successful relationships within the construction industry. As the first point of contact for our software customers, we help them make the most of FlexcavoOS and help them achieve greater success in their projects.
teams_description_4: As a numbers-oriented finance team, we not only keep an eye on all our financial flows, but we also constantly optimize the financing mix of our machine fleet. In this way, we ensure that our expansion runs seamlessly.
teams_description_5: As a product team, we strive to improve FlexcavoOS and enhance it with new features. We cooperate closely with our customers to build the best product for the intelligent construction site of the future.
teams_description_6: As an engineering team, we're putting new features into action. We are building the FlexcavoOS platform that will make every construction company in the world smarter and more efficient.
teams_description_7: The People & Organization team is all about our candidates and employees. We work to build a world-class team and create a fantastic work environment.
your_contact_description: Our headquarter is located in the heart of Berlin, but we operate across all of Germany.

our_values_subtitle_3: We work together as a team towards one goal
our_values_subtitle_4: We give every talent a clear perspective and the opportunity to grow
our_values_subtitle_5: We are agile and learn quickly
our_values_subtitle_6: We take the responsibility to achieve the best end result
